All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutDialog
    Shows a constructed About dialog box.
    AlertBox
    AlertBox shows a message besides a warning symbol.
    AppletFrame
    The window with the applet.
    Cell
    Every cell in the grid is a Cell-object.
    CellGrid
    Interface between GameOfLifeCanvas and GameOfLife.
    CellGridCanvas
    Subclass of Canvas, which makes the cellgrid visible.
    EasyFile
    Class for easy text file read and write operations.
    GameLoggerSetupData  
    GameOfLife
    The Game Of Life Applet.
    GameOfLifeControls
    GUI-controls of the Game of Life.
    GameOfLifeControlsEvent
    Event class for GameOfLifeControls.
    GameOfLifeControlsListener
    Listener interface for GameOfLifeControls.
    GameOfLifeGrid
    Contains the cellgrid, the current shape and the Game Of Life algorithm that changes it.
    ImageComponent
    A component to add a image to (e.g.) a panel.
    LineEnumerator
    Enumerates over a string containing a text file, returning lines.
    Shape
    Shape contains data of one (predefined) shape.
    ShapeCollection
    Contains some nice Game Of Life shapes.
    ShapeException
    Exception for shapes (too big, not found...).
    StandaloneGameOfLife
    Turns GameOfLife applet into application.
    TextFileDialog
    Shows a text file in a dialog box.
